Welcome to the course materials for the Biostatistics courses in the Research School in Clinical Psychiatry at Karolinska Institutet. This website contains all materials related to the afternoon lab sessions.

## Available Courses

Select the course you are enrolled in:

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Course 1](course-1/index.html)

Fundamentals of biostatistics for clinical research, including descriptive statistics, probability, hypothesis testing, and power analysis.

[Enter Course 1 →](course-1/index.html){.btn .btn-primary}
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
### [Course 2](course-2/index.html)

Fundamentals of regression modeling for clinical research, including interpreting results using the `marginaleffects` package.

[Enter Course 2 →](course-2/index.html){.btn .btn-secondary}
:::

## Teaching Team

The course director is [Matteo Bottai](https://ki.se/en/people/matteo-bottai), Professor of Biostatistics at Karolinska Institutet. Course leaders are [Kristoffer Magnusson](https://ki.se/en/people/kristoffer-magnusson), [Fred Johansson](https://ki.se/en/people/fredrik-johansson) and [Oskar Flygare](https://ki.se/en/people/oskar-flygare), all researchers at Centre for Psychiatry Research, Karolinska Institutet.
